channel.title: CVE Feed for D-Link -- DSL-224
channel.description: The latest CVEs for D-Link -- DSL-224

item.title: CVE-2022-36786|2024-08-03T10:14:28.406Z -- d-link -- dsl-224
item.description: DLINK - DSL-224 Post-auth RCE. DLINK router version 3.0.8 has an interface where you can configure NTP servers (Network Time Protocol) via jsonrpc API. It is possible to inject a command through this interface that will run with ROOT permissions on the router.
